timeline.message:
fix slashing data export

After recent changes to use SyncDataAccessor, the slashing protection exporter requires a path to be passed, or an NPE occurs.

Also found that the path in use by the export command wasn't correct.

Fixes #2747

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest using path.toAbsolutePath() to get an absolute path before attempting to get the parent.  It still may have no parent if it's the root path but if it's a relative path the absolute version may have a parent when the relative doesn't.
timeline.author: ajsutton
